subject: Basketball
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: A legal battle between the Harlem Wizards and the Harlem Ambassadors, two show basketball teams, centers on accusations that a player was induced to jump from one team to the other.
snippet: A legal battle between the Harlem Wizards and the Harlem Ambassadors, two show basketball teams, centers on accusations that a player was induced to jump from one team to the other.
